input_text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to add an extra email address on linkedin?
input_text.Response A: Sure, it’s pretty easy! You can go to your account settings and then click on the “Add a new email address” link on the right hand side. LinkedIn will then send a verification email to your new address. Once you verify the new email address, you can use it to log in to LinkedIn.
input_text.Response B: Sure, I can help you with that. You’ll need to go to the account settings page and click on the “Personal Email” tab.  Then you’ll need to click on the “Add Email Address” button, and enter your new email address.  Once you’ve done that, you can click on the “Save” button to save your changes.
